programme.title: Tin Man
programme.desc: After a storm sent by the tyrannical sorceress Azkadellia, DG manages to escape her small town and finds herself in the dangerous underworld know as the O.Z. There she befriends three of its inhabitants: Glitch, Wyatt Cain and Raw and meets the great Mystic Man. They all help her escape from the evil sorceress whos after her.

programme.title: Gentle Ben
programme.desc: When Mark goes for a visit with his uncle hes thrown into a world he knows not much about. Little does he know itll be a world hes going to have to become very familiar with. One character Mark becomes very familiar and friendly with is a very tame black bear who he later names Ben

programme.title: The Diplomat
programme.desc: A British diplomat is arrested on charges of working with Russian mafia. After death threats to his wife, they are taken into protective custody. Then the MI6 shows up with a new piece of the puzzle.

programme.title: The Diplomat
programme.desc: A British diplomat is arrested on charges of working with Russian mafia. After death threats to his wife, they are taken into protective custody. Then the MI6 shows up with a new piece of the puzzle.

programme.title: An Old Fashioned Thanksgiving
programme.desc: In the late 1880s, a widowed mother of three struggles to keep her family intact and to put food on the table. The oldest daughter sends a letter to her estranged, very wealthy grandmother urging her assistance, much to her mothers disapproval. When the grandmother arrives, old wounds are opened but eventually healed. From a story by Louisa May Alcott. Stars Jacqueline Bisset, Ted Atherton, Tatiana Maslany, Helene Joy, Paula Boudreau, and Michael Barbuto.

programme.title: Jane Doe: Ties That Bind
programme.desc: DNA evidence and camera footage places a corrupt CEO as the prime suspect in the murder of a company whistle-blower, but Jane Doe believes the real killer may be a twin sibling.

programme.title: The Royal Scandal
programme.desc: Sir Arthur Conan Doyles Sherlock Holmes - the worlds greatest detective - faces a most alluring adversary... Legendary opera star Irene Adler is threatening to destroy the King of Bohemias reputation with proof of their illicit affair. The evidence? A photograph. Her ransom? The kings hand in marriage. But not only does investigating detective Sherlock Holmes already know Irene from the past, he also knows that the queen of manipulation would never resort to such a common crime. After uncovering her true ambitions, Holmes draws the cunning songstress into a well-matched game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: Prayers For Bobby
programme.desc: Emotional drama based on a true story. In 1970s America, a deeply devout mother finds her religious beliefs shaken when she learns that her son is gay. She urges her son to devote his time to the church in the hope that it will cure him of his sin, but the boys increasing isolation leads to a tragic outcome. The woman is forced to question her faith and reassess her views.

programme.title: Children Of Dune
programme.desc: As Alia becomes totally possessed she also has to deal with rebel Fremen. Ghanima, who survived an attack on her by House Corrino, is now engaged to Faradn Corrino. Unexpectedly, Leto II returns from the desert being believed dead. While in the desert his body has absorbed some sand-trout, slowly mutating him into a sand-worm. Alia resists possession by the baron while Irulan declines Jessicas offer to return with her to Caladan.

programme.title: Too Late to Say Goodbye
programme.desc: Bart Corbins wife Jenn dies in their home, apparently suicide, as the police believes. While he moves in with young sons Taylor and Trevor at brother Bobbys, her sister Heather starts a relentless campaign, without any clue, to make the police believe Bart must have murdered her and had an affair with practice secretary Dara.

programme.title: XIII: The Conspiracy
programme.desc: The assassination of the US President places a man in the center of an even larger plot.

programme.title: XIII: The Conspiracy
programme.desc: The assassination of the US President places a man in the center of an even larger plot.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Edge of Alaska
programme.desc: Hidden deep in the wilderness of eastern Alaska and built during the Gold Rush as Alaskas original Sin City, only 42 residents currently brave the extreme conditions in McCarthy. Its an isolated outlaw town - a refuge for people who dont want to be found thats surrounded by extreme wilderness over 100 miles from the authorities where young men go to prove themselves and old outlaws go to die; hunters, gold miners, gunsmiths, and survivalists who reside in this Old West town are willing to risk their lives to live truly free. While some believe in continuing the towns frontier way of life, others feel the future of McCarthy depends on dragging itself into the modern age. Which way of life will reign supreme?

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Bronx Zoo, one of the largest zoos in the USA and the largest city zoo the country has to offer. Opening their doors to camera crews, the daily operations of the world-famous animal sanctuary are revealed, as the staff keep their loving creatures healthy and happy. Renowned for its diverse collection of animals and wonderful exhibitions, the Bronx Zoo is one of the finest in the world, home to lions, bears, tigers, snow leopards, baboons, flamingos and many more extravagant species. This series showcases the effort, experience and expertise required to run the Bronx Zoo.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: This reality TV show follows Marty Raney and his two children, Matt Raney and Misty Bilodeau, who are successful homesteaders from the state of Alaska and have the skills needed to fish, hunt, raise livestock, and otherwise survive in an untamed landscape. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Today at Gulf Coast, Damon, a rescue dog found bleeding and missing a paw, is a candidate for an artificial limb. Dr. Beale gets Damon ready for an operation on his foot to fit the prosthetic limb designed by Animal Prosthetic Maker Bill Bickley. With the new paw, Damons life is transformed and is now enjoying life with his newly adopted family in Colorado. Two African caracal cats, Nova and Starlord, come to Gulf Coast to investigate why the female Nova is having digestion troubles. After a series of tests, Dr. Chen prescribes medications that do the trick - after a week of treatment, Nova is showing signs of improvement by maintaining a healthy appetite and being a playful mate to Starlord. Lucy, a dachshund, is rushed to the ICU and a crushed jaw. Dr. Chanda Miles performs two marathon surgeries, and places steel bone plates to hold the jaw together. Although challenging, the procedure is a success, and Lucy has a shot at recovery. Meanwhile, Emma, a French Bulldog, is brought to the neurology department with paralyzed legs. Dr. Laura Vasquez performs emergency surgery to remove ruptured disc material in hopes of regaining her ability to walk. The procedure is a success and within 24 hours, Emma begins to walk and is expected to make a full recovery. Two sea turtles are driven 200-miles from the Gulf of Mexico to Avian and Exotics to remove a rash of tumors that are growing out of control all over their bodies. Dr. Chen and Danielle help these endangered animals by using a CO2 laser to remove the tumors before they grow so large that they cause paralysis or blindness. Finally, Darth Rachel, a Labrador retriever, is brought to Gulf Coast because of her heavy labored breathing. Dr. Heidi Hottinger performs surgery to permanently hold open the cartilage on one side of her airway. Despite now having a clear airway, Darth Rachel retains her raspy breathing.

programme.title: Extinct or Alive
programme.desc: Extinct or Alive is an Animal Planet documentary show exploring the possible existence of animals thought to be extinct. Biologist and explorer Forrest Galante follows real life stories and visits wildlife locations across the planet, hoping to discover proof that animals such as the Zanzibar leopard or the Galapagos tortoise still exist. Find out if his methods will bring new exciting discoveries. Could animals we think are extinct for a century still be found in nature?

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Alaskan Bush People is an American docudrama-style reality TV series revolving around the Brown family, members of which are trying to survive in the wilderness, far away from the society. Take a journey deep into Alaskas bush, where naturalist and adventurer Billy Brown, along with his wife, Ami, and their seven children, choose to live life on their own terms, connected to wild nature and bonded to each other.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Alaskan Bush People is an American docudrama-style reality TV series revolving around the Brown family, members of which are trying to survive in the wilderness, far away from the society. Take a journey deep into Alaskas bush, where naturalist and adventurer Billy Brown, along with his wife, Ami, and their seven children, choose to live life on their own terms, connected to wild nature and bonded to each other.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: A show dedicated to animal lovers from around the world, this series tells the stories of creatures that are desperate for help and need to be rescued by humans. The viewer witnesss the inspiring tales of the incredible lengths some humans will go to in order to give hope to these unfortunate beasts and explores the characters and personalities of both human and animal. Epsiodes highlight stories such as when Pen Farthing, a veteran of the war in Afghanistan, couldnt return with his companion dog and so he set up a shelter in Kabul that provides medical care for ex-servoice dogs; when animals need a prosthetic limb, Derrick Campana will desing one, even for an elephant; or when Animal Defenders International (ADI), try to introduce bans on circuses in Peru.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Bronx Zoo, one of the largest zoos in the USA and the largest city zoo the country has to offer. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Documentary series that follows the people who work for The Pennsylvania Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, based in downtown Philadelphia, and whose job is to, on a daily basis, rescue, rehabilitate and re-home unwanted or neglected animals of all types, seeking justice against the perpetrators that abused them. Although, primarily following the Law Enforcement Officers, the programme also shows the combined efforts of PSPCA Veterinarians, Technicians, Shelter Staff and Administration.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Documentary series that follows the people who work for The Pennsylvania Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, based in downtown Philadelphia, and whose job is to, on a daily basis, rescue, rehabilitate and re-home unwanted or neglected animals of all types, seeking justice against the perpetrators that abused them. Although, primarily following the Law Enforcement Officers, the programme also shows the combined efforts of PSPCA Veterinarians, Technicians, Shelter Staff and Administration.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins

The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: Treetop Cat Rescue
programme.desc: Climbing enthusiasts brother-in-law duo Shaun Sears and Tom Otto work together to rescue the felines that climb beyond capability and get stuck in Washington State. The experienced tree climbers do their best to rescue all of the cats they find out about whether a call comes in at day or night. With sometimes unfavourable weather, weak branches and bees nests to overcome the pair have to overcome obstacles and then have to avoid scaring the cats away as they approach.

programme.title: Treetop Cat Rescue

programme.title: In Search of Monsters
programme.desc: Documentary series. Using eye-witness accounts and new, incredible scientific evidence, In Search Of Monsters brings to life the haunting creatures that both fright and fascinate us. Narrated by Gabe Kunda, the series covers some of the most iconic and infamous monsters in folklore. From Bigfoots DNA to Nessies true whereabouts, In Search Of Monsters investigates astonishing new theories on these grisly giants.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: Scaled
programme.desc: Scaled is a documentary show following reptile-lover Greg West and his team, as they make custom terrariums and cages for reptile-owners across America. Those who are not fans of traditional fluffy pets want to create one-of-a-kind habitats for snakes, skinks, agamas or frogs. The unique ideas for creative design of Greg are turned into reality in the show. Meet these extraordinary animals and their owners, as the team of Cornels World make their environment more special.

programme.title: Extinct or Alive
programme.desc: Extinct or Alive is an Animal Planet documentary show exploring the possible existence of animals thought to be extinct. Biologist and explorer Forrest Galante follows real life stories and visits wildlife locations across the planet, hoping to discover proof that animals such as the Zanzibar leopard or the Galapagos tortoise still exist. Find out if his methods will bring new exciting discoveries. Could animals we think are extinct for a century still be found in nature?

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: IM ALIVE features the death-defying and moving stories of people who — regardless of the obstacles or consequences — were determined to survive an animal attack. Driven by thoughts of loved ones and the desire to live, these individuals found the strength to survive terrifying and unexpected encounters by some of natures most dangerous creatures. This inspirational drama combines victim interviews with true-to-life reenactments, giving a replay of the split-second decisions that saved lives. Over the course of 10 episodes, IM ALIVE immerses viewers in the psychological experience of those involved, focusing on what pulled them through and what left them powerfully changed. Every survivor had something to live for, and in that fleeting moment of chaos, their desire for life outshone the attack.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: When one thinks of dominant animals that roam the earth, large predators - lions, grizzlies and titanic anacondas come to mind. But, pound for pound, the most powerful and awe-inspiring creatures are the elusive micro-monsters that exist just beneath our feet. Wildlife author and expert Bradley Trevor Greive and biodesigner Billy Almon venture to some of the most remote and inhospitable habitats in the world to track down these tiny beasts. Using state of the art equipment, they will measure the abilities of these creatures and present them in a way never seen before.

programme.desc: When one thinks of dominant animals that roam the earth, large predators - lions, grizzlies and titanic anacondas come to mind. But, pound for pound, the most powerful and awe-inspiring creatures are the elusive micro-monsters that exist just beneath our feet. Wildlife author and expert Bradley Trevor Greive and biodesigner Billy Almon venture to some of the most remote and inhospitable habitats in the world to track down these tiny beasts. Using state of the art equipment, they will measure the abilities of these creatures and present them in a way never seen before.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Bronx Zoo, one of the largest zoos in the USA and the largest city zoo the country has to offer. Opening their doors to camera crews, the daily operations of the world-famous animal sanctuary are revealed, as the staff keep their loving creatures healthy and happy. Renowned for its diverse collection of animals and wonderful exhibitions, the Bronx Zoo is one of the finest in the world, home to lions, bears, tigers, snow leopards, baboons, flamingos and many more extravagant species. This series showcases the effort, experience and expertise required to run the Bronx Zoo.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: This reality TV show follows Marty Raney and his two children, Matt Raney and Misty Bilodeau, who are successful homesteaders from the state of Alaska and have the skills needed to fish, hunt, raise livestock, and otherwise survive in an untamed landscape. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: When one thinks of dominant animals that roam the earth, large predators - lions, grizzlies and titanic anacondas come to mind. But, pound for pound, the most powerful and awe-inspiring creatures are the elusive micro-monsters that exist just beneath our feet. Wildlife author and expert Bradley Trevor Greive and biodesigner Billy Almon venture to some of the most remote and inhospitable habitats in the world to track down these tiny beasts. Using state of the art equipment, they will measure the abilities of these creatures and present them in a way never seen before.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Documentary series that follows the people who work for The Pennsylvania Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, based in downtown Philadelphia, and whose job is to, on a daily basis, rescue, rehabilitate and re-home unwanted or neglected animals of all types, seeking justice against the perpetrators that abused them. Although, primarily following the Law Enforcement Officers, the programme also shows the combined efforts of PSPCA Veterinarians, Technicians, Shelter Staff and Administration.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Documentary series that follows the people who work for The Pennsylvania Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, based in downtown Philadelphia, and whose job is to, on a daily basis, rescue, rehabilitate and re-home unwanted or neglected animals of all types, seeking justice against the perpetrators that abused them. Although, primarily following the Law Enforcement Officers, the programme also shows the combined efforts of PSPCA Veterinarians, Technicians, Shelter Staff and Administration.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: We Love Puppies
programme.desc: This hilarious and heart-warming look at everyday life with mans best friend explores the bonds we share with these adorable bundles of fur whether theyre a mutt or a purebred.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: American animal TV series with designer Antonio Ballatore own show creating the perfect space for pet owning families. Believing that if dad can have a "man cave" and mum a "she shed" then surely there is such thing as a animal crib?! Antonios passion for design and animals shines through throughout every episode. Joined by project manager Grace and their trusty companion Chewie the Bulldog they produce the most fantastic spaces for both pets and their owners. Pets include Chinchillas, dogs, cats and snakes and possibly many more.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Today the staff of Gulf Coast Veterinary Specialists, comes to the aid of the Houston Humane Society after they receive over 200 neglected animals that are confiscated during a pet store raid. Exotic animal specialist Danielle Inman and Dr. Sue Chen treat a wide variety of animals for issues related to neglect and mismanagement. Fortunately, almost all the animals make a full recovery and are placed into loving homes.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: Preposterous Pets
programme.desc: In this programme, we delve into the stories of eccentric individuals who have developed a special relationship with unusual, exotic animals, ranging from giant alligators and polar bears to deadly scorpions and wild capybaras. Join us as we set out on a journey across the globe to meet these extraordinary pets and their owners.

programme.title: Great White Kill Zone: Guadalupe
programme.desc: 150 miles off the coast of Baja, California, Guadalupe Island is a notorious hot spot for great white sharks. Here to target the abundant seal population, great whites are silent hunters, stalking their prey and killing with a surprise attack. But the waters surrounding Guadalupe Island are crystal clear. So how do they do it? At other white shark hot spots around the world there is always a kill zone – a place where more predation events occur. But here in Guadalupe, an attack has never been witnessed. Now, a team of experts led by Dr. Yannis Papastamatiou and Melissa Marquez, are setting out to record never before seen white shark hunting behaviors. With the help of cutting-edge technology and three kinds of specialist cameras, they aim to discover the location of the Guadalupe Kill Zone.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: IM ALIVE features the death-defying and moving stories of people who — regardless of the obstacles or consequences — were determined to survive an animal attack. Driven by thoughts of loved ones and the desire to live, these individuals found the strength to survive terrifying and unexpected encounters by some of natures most dangerous creatures. This inspirational drama combines victim interviews with true-to-life reenactments, giving a replay of the split-second decisions that saved lives. Over the course of 10 episodes, IM ALIVE immerses viewers in the psychological experience of those involved, focusing on what pulled them through and what left them powerfully changed. Every survivor had something to live for, and in that fleeting moment of chaos, their desire for life outshone the attack.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Documentary series that follows the people who work for The Pennsylvania Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, based in downtown Philadelphia, and whose job is to, on a daily basis, rescue, rehabilitate and re-home unwanted or neglected animals of all types, seeking justice against the perpetrators that abused them. Although, primarily following the Law Enforcement Officers, the programme also shows the combined efforts of PSPCA Veterinarians, Technicians, Shelter Staff and Administration.

programme.title: Clive Myries Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: The Coronation Market is the largest street market in all of Jamaica, and its nestled in Downtown Kingston. Its where Clive brushes up on his Jamaican patois and tries out some of the best street food on the island. He also catches up with a mural art collective who have been transforming this district before checking out a trendy boutique to get kitted out with some brand new Downtown threads, hoping to look the part for a night out at the hottest reggae club in town.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Talking Movies
programme.desc: Join for the latest news from the world of film, including everything from documentaries to mainstream, indie and world cinema. The presenter travels all over the world, attending the greatest festivals and exclusive premieres, interviewing all the biggest stars, which over the years included big names such as Jude Law, Catherine Zeta Jones, Eathan Hawke, Ben Kingsley, Sally Hawkins and many others. The show also explores the newest trends and issues in the world of cinema.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. programme.title: Talking Business
programme.desc: On Talking Business BBC presenters, based in the worlds most dynamic cities, discuss with the most important and influential people from the world of business and finance, the key issues of the day. Corporate leaders, global investors, top creatives, cutting-edge entrepreneurs and leading intellectuals gather together weekly to discuss and analyse the issues and trends that most affect how business has to work in todays world. Our team of presenters are experts on the issues and developments which are shaping the way we work, consume and live in the 21st Century.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Спецслужбы проводят взрывные работы на участке, где зафиксированы магнитные аномалии. Совершенно случайно в зоне взрыва оказываются три человека: преступник Владимир Голенко, фотохудожник Олег Малинин и неудачливый писатель Венедикт Тартаковский. В результате взрыва между этими людьми возникает странная связь – фотограф Малинин может читать мысли преступника Голенко, и даже видеть окружающий мир его глазами, а писатель Тартаковский может полностью управлять действиями Голенко и при этом общаться с Малининым на расстоянии. Тартаковский, получив в свое полное распоряжение преступника Голенко, решает его руками отомстить всем, кто мешал ему в жизни. Город захлестывает череда кровавых преступлений...

programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Спецслужбы проводят взрывные работы на участке, где зафиксированы магнитные аномалии. Совершенно случайно в зоне взрыва оказываются три человека: преступник Владимир Голенко, фотохудожник Олег Малинин и неудачливый писатель Венедикт Тартаковский. В результате взрыва между этими людьми возникает странная связь – фотограф Малинин может читать мысли преступника Голенко, и даже видеть окружающий мир его глазами, а писатель Тартаковский может полностью управлять действиями Голенко и при этом общаться с Малининым на расстоянии. Тартаковский, получив в свое полное распоряжение преступника Голенко, решает его руками отомстить всем, кто мешал ему в жизни. Город захлестывает череда кровавых преступлений...

programme.title: Водоворот чужих желаний
programme.desc: Олег догадывается, что Русалка найдена. Макар с Сергеем начинают распутывать дело Русалки. С каждым днем все больше новых событий и действующих лиц. Заложница Белова в фургоне не обнаружена, хотя ей свидетельские показания, что ее убили. Нужно заниматься проверкой. Макар и Сергей пытаются разобраться с информацией, но пока помощи от Шмидта немного.

programme.title: Водоворот чужих желаний
programme.desc: Получили первые рисунки Русалки, уже проще продолжать расследование. Пока это единственные положительные моменты в ходе движения дела. Катя с Ларисой обсуждают рабочие вопросы и личную жизнь друг друга. С помощью друзей из органов Макар получил первых подозреваемых по делу, Сергей должен проверить каждого из них. Выясняются некоторые важные детали из истории Русалки. История не для слабонервных, Макар не верит свои ушам, но это правда.

programme.title: Водоворот чужих желаний
programme.desc: Макар ловит подозреваемого, но понимает, что эта история про магический артефакт очень странная. Показания Викуловой кажутся неправдоподобными, это нужно выяснить, иначе дело не сдвинется. Катя явно что-то скрывает, и Капитошин понимает это. Макар с Сергеем проверяют даже самые сомнительные показания, но только так можно хоть в чем-то разобраться. Катя многое знает про Русалку, но она не готова делиться информацией. Макар должен найти способ получить эту информацию.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: После неожиданной атаки Леона и его попытки убить преступника и друзей, Таран берет его и свою кровь для экспертизы. Он подозревает, что их кто-то отравил психотропными веществами. Результаты анализов действительно положительные, однако приглашенный профессионал уверен, что без дополнительных средств, например, гипноз, заставить людей убить невозможно.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: В городе происходит несколько нападений на инкассаторские машины. Налеты проводят дерзко, с убийствами. Дело дают в руки лучшего опера Киева Виктора Тарана, если он раскроет его, сможет претендовать на место начальника. А если банду не найдут в ближайшее время, то могут полететь головы вышестоящего начальства, так как обеспеченные влиятельные люди не любят терять свои деньги.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Оперативники находят машину, которую использовали грабители. Её владелец – алкоголик, который недавно отдал старое авто малознакомому парню. Один из бизнесменов, которому светит приговор, доносит генералу, кто меняет украденные из инкассаторских машин наличные. Если органы не захотят оказывать ему услугу, им придется объяснять прессе связь с крупными инвесторами, которые по стечению обстоятельств работают с менялами.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Криминалисты Макаров, Ройзман и Ким выезжают "на тело". Макаров – новый нач.лаборатории ЭКЦ. На месте он знакомится со следователем Богданой Ковальской и операми Щегловым (Демоном) и Киценко. Версии Богданы и Макарова расходятся, но уступать ни один из них не хочет. Богдана встречается с судебным прокурором Игорем Карпенко, но он женат и трепещет перед своей женой Аллой, хотя и постоянно обещает Богдане развестись. Алла подозревает мужа в измене, но доказательств у нее нет. Подруга Богданы – Вера – с интересом относится к появлению Макарова. Как оказалось, Макарова на должность "продвинул" его бывший коллега и друг – полковник Туманов. У Макарова происходят столкновения с Богданой на профессиональной почве. Месяц назад убили сестру-близнеца Макарова – Иру. Убийцу не нашли, дело закрыли. Макаров собирается сам продолжить расследование, используя допуск к делу, который у него теперь есть.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Макаров приходит к приятелю – Виктору Берштадскому, с которым они дружат с детства. У него своя частная лаборатория "Спектр". Богдана опять забывает забрать дочку Яну из танцевального кружка. С Макаровым она по-прежнему в контрах, однако вынуждена признать, что спец он отличный. В жизни Игоря Карпенко намечается карьерный рост. У Киценко появляется подружка – аспирантка-филолог. В кабинете у Богданы Макаров знакомится с ее дочкой – Яной. Продолжая расследовать убийство сестры Ирины, Макаров вспоминает свой последний разговор с ней. Она рассказала ему, что у нее на операционном столе умер пациент. Макаров выясняет имя погибшего – Илья Кошевой. Богдана признается Карпенко, что устала от их отношений. Ей нужен муж, а Яне – отец. Вечером Макаров встречается в баре с Берштадским. Он уверен, что сестру убили преднамеренно. Подняв дело об убийстве сестры, он увидел, что на щеке у мертвой Иры был след в виде змейки. На снимках, найденных в Интернете, на пальце у жены Ильи Кошевого, Инги, Макаров замечает тяжелое кольцо в виде змейки.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: В лабораторию приходит новый сотрудник – Олеся Бильчак. Макаров недоволен тем, что полковник Туманов прислал к нему столь юную и неопытную сотрудницу. Но Леся – любимая племянница Туманова. Между Лесей и Щегловым возникает симпатия. Ким, Ройзман и Смирнитский разыгрывают Лесю, заперев ее в комнате с трупами и выключив свет. Однако она показывает себя молодцом. Макаров по-прежнему ведет себя с Богданой заносчиво и самоуверенно. Карпенко привозит Богдану в ресторан на окраине города. Но там они натыкаются на подругу Аллы. Чтобы она не заметила их, они сбегают из ресторана, так и не поужинав. Игорь бросает Богдану одну. Богдана рассказывает Вере о том, как Карпенко "кинул" ее в ресторане. Вера советует Богдане, наконец, решиться и бросить Карпенко. Стас Ким выясняет, что Инга Кошевая – кинолог. Макаров едет в клуб кинологов, знакомится с Ингой. Он видит у нее на пальце кольцо со змейкой, приглашает ее попить кофе. А затем незаметно крадет ее стаканчик, чтобы впоследствии снять с него отпечатки пальцев. Это воровство замечает приятель Инги – Олег.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Карпенко приходит к Богдане с букетом цветов и с извинениями. Он кается. Богдана старается "поставить вопрос ребром", но Карпенко заговаривает ей зубы. Леся просит у Макарова, чтобы он доверил ей настоящую работу. Он предлагает ей еще раз тщательно осмотреть труп потерпевшей. Леся осматривает тело жертвы и обнаруживает улику, которую при осмотре упустил криминалист Ройзман. Макаров устраивает Ройзману за это взбучку. Ким заступается за коллегу. В расследовании очередного дела Макаров снова обращается к Берштадскому и рассказывает ему о Инге Кошевой, ее кольце со змейкой и что ее отпечатки пальцев совпадают с отпечатками, найденными на входной двери в квартире Иры. Богдана случайно застает Макарова за разговором с какой-то старушкой, которая просит, чтобы ее "невинно арестованного" внука-инвалида отпустили. Макаров соглашается. Богдана меняет свое мнение о Макарове. Щеглов видит, как Лесю увозит с работы молодой парень-байкер. Киценко начинает его подкалывать. Кинолог Олег рассказывает Инге Кошевой, что выяснил, кто такой Андрей Макаров. Инга обдумывает эту информацию и заявляет Олегу, что намерена нанести Макарову "упреждающий удар".

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Оперативники находят машину, которую использовали грабители. Её владелец – алкоголик, который недавно отдал старое авто малознакомому парню. Один из бизнесменов, которому светит приговор, доносит генералу, кто меняет украденные из инкассаторских машин наличные. Если органы не захотят оказывать ему услугу, им придется объяснять прессе связь с крупными инвесторами, которые по стечению обстоятельств работают с менялами.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Раненый грабитель пытается самостоятельно вытянуть шар из ноги, затрагивает артерию и умирает. Милиция приезжает к нему на квартиру слишком поздно. Таран уверен, что последний налет организовал Таир, пытаясь отвести от себя подозрения. Но ни у одного из отделов никаких серьезных доказательств нет. Таран предлагает объединить свои усилия, чтобы найти убийц как можно скорее.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Убийство двух оперативников, самоубийство подозреваемого и арест коллеги при попытке незаконно купить оружие – все это сваливается на Тарана за одну ночь. В квартире беглеца грабителя находят целый "арсенал", теперь операм становится неясно, зачем грабителям надо было нападать на участкового. Они начинают расследовать его возможной причастности к налетам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Крылов назначен начальником лаборатории. Он пытается сблизиться с Анной, но она вновь его отталкивает. Она не знает, что Лёшка попал под влияние только что вышедшего из тюрьмы преступника по фамилии Голубев. Тем временем в карьере найден труп молодого мужчины. Крылов сразу же выдвигает неожиданную версию – перед смертью с жертвой кто-то играл в догонялки…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: В лабораторию приходит новый сотрудник – Олеся Бильчак. Макаров недоволен тем, что полковник Туманов прислал к нему столь юную и неопытную сотрудницу. Но Леся – любимая племянница Туманова. Между Лесей и Щегловым возникает симпатия. Ким, Ройзман и Смирнитский разыгрывают Лесю, заперев ее в комнате с трупами и выключив свет. Однако она показывает себя молодцом. Макаров по-прежнему ведет себя с Богданой заносчиво и самоуверенно. Карпенко привозит Богдану в ресторан на окраине города. Но там они натыкаются на подругу Аллы. Чтобы она не заметила их, они сбегают из ресторана, так и не поужинав. Игорь бросает Богдану одну. Богдана рассказывает Вере о том, как Карпенко "кинул" ее в ресторане. Вера советует Богдане, наконец, решиться и бросить Карпенко. Стас Ким выясняет, что Инга Кошевая – кинолог. Макаров едет в клуб кинологов, знакомится с Ингой. Он видит у нее на пальце кольцо со змейкой, приглашает ее попить кофе. А затем незаметно крадет ее стаканчик, чтобы впоследствии снять с него отпечатки пальцев. Это воровство замечает приятель Инги – Олег.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Карпенко приходит к Богдане с букетом цветов и с извинениями. Он кается. Богдана старается "поставить вопрос ребром", но Карпенко заговаривает ей зубы. Леся просит у Макарова, чтобы он доверил ей настоящую работу. Он предлагает ей еще раз тщательно осмотреть труп потерпевшей. Леся осматривает тело жертвы и обнаруживает улику, которую при осмотре упустил криминалист Ройзман. Макаров устраивает Ройзману за это взбучку. Ким заступается за коллегу. В расследовании очередного дела Макаров снова обращается к Берштадскому и рассказывает ему о Инге Кошевой, ее кольце со змейкой и что ее отпечатки пальцев совпадают с отпечатками, найденными на входной двери в квартире Иры. programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai the blue jay and Rigby the raccoon hate having to do work as groundskeepers at the local park, trying to slack off whenever they can. programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball must find a way to save his relationship with Darwin after the boys are forced to live in separate rooms.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.desc: The Wattersons try and reconnect Darwin to his fish roots. programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. 1

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin help Anais rescue her doll from Tina Rex. / Gumball and Darwin are unwitting accomplices in a gas station robbery. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally destroy Mr Robinsons new car… or do they? / Gumball experiences an impossibly unfortunate chain of events. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Gumball is embarrassed when Mum comes to school to spend some "quality time". / Gumballs magic tinfoil helmet threatens to tear the Watterson family apart! / Anais is convinced that Gumball is being bullied by Tina Rex.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: "When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. Gumball has through gritted teeth prepared a special dinner for Alan to apologise for the way he has treated him in the past. When Alan cancels he is overjoyed until a post on Elmore Plus reveals Alan lied about his Mom being sick and is having a day of fun with his family instead. Gumball tracks down the traitor to give him a piece of his mind but when he finds out his Mom really is sick he has to find a way to make it up to him.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana is a super-feisty, forward-thinking and passionate 11-year-old girl, who is also the heir to her fathers adventuring ship, the Mighty Windbreaker. Along with her captain dad and his diverse crew (an orc, a dwarf, a barbarian and a cyclops), she sails across the Ten Realms, dreaming of becoming one of the greatest adventurers of all time. But first, she must overcome some challenging obstacles: impulsivity, stubbornness, extreme curiosity, disdain for rules … and a love of pancakes. All the best things about her!

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Raven and Beast Boy are shocked to discover that their exes Terra and Aqualad are now dating each other. / Robin uses a prism to split each Titan into the five facets of their personalities so he can choose only the best parts for his ideal crime fighting team. / The Titans negative behavior is giving superheroes a bad name, so they must learn proper conduct to be good role models for kids. / Robin starts working at an ice cream shop to get revenge on Jokers Gelato for denying him a free birthday scoop.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. The Stump Kids and Jessica encounter Carter, who has now rebooted as a new robot - they decide to teach him to be a child again, but he suddenly begins mimicking Craig to the point that he starts to look like him and do things without him. Angered about his stolen identity, Craig tries to reawaken who he once was but ends up putting Jessica in danger...

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Craig is preparing a birthday gift for Jessica and decides to tell Cannonball and Sparkle Cadet how he became a good builder through the story of what happened when Craig and Bernard were dropped off at their grandparents while Jessica was being born - neither the older brother nor the baby of the family any more, Craig therefore helped with a project...

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. When Craig takes Jessica to the Creek and she becomes intrigued by Kits Trading Tree business, Kit takes her on as an intern and shows her the ins and outs of running it. When Jessica gives away "sticker chips" to the Creek Kids, Kit and Jessica hit upon a new business strategy, but when their stock runs dry, the kids turn into zombies as they demand more!

With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin use Mollys time-halting power (because shes so boring) to avoid an after school beatdown by Tina.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Nicole wants a new family portrait where everyones entire face is in the photo and theyre all smiling.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball vows to wear a shell and partake in strange Fitzgerald traditions, in order to help Penny get through a tense family birthday party with ease.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin seek healthy food for their family, but an evil food consortium controls the industry.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana is a super-feisty, forward-thinking and passionate 11-year-old girl, who is also the heir to her fathers adventuring ship, the Mighty Windbreaker. Along with her captain dad and his diverse crew (an orc, a dwarf, a barbarian and a cyclops), she sails across the Ten Realms, dreaming of becoming one of the greatest adventurers of all time. But first, she must overcome some challenging obstacles: impulsivity, stubbornness, extreme curiosity, disdain for rules … and a love of pancakes. All the best things about her!

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Adventure Time

Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai the blue jay and Rigby the raccoon hate having to do work as groundskeepers at the local park, trying to slack off whenever they can. When they have simple problems to solve, they often lead to a surreal, extreme, and often supernatural misadventures. Usually this makes their boss, Benson (a gumball machine) extremely angry and on the verge to fire them and annoys their coworker, Skips (a yeti, voiced by Mark Hamill). The pair are always saved by the other manager/owner Pops (a man with a lollipop-shaped head) as he enjoys their constant antics. Co-workers Muscle-Man (an overweight, green man) and Hi-Five Ghost sometimes get involved in the shenanigans, but usually find a way out and leave Mordecai and Rigby in the firing line.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. 1

Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.desc: Gumball wants to get Richard on the cheerleading team in order to end their familys generational trauma.

programme.desc: Gumball and Penny must stay together all day to prove their bond, defying Mr. Smalls astrological prediction.
