programme.title: Ideālā Ferdinanda Čevala pils
programme.desc: Ševals ir pastnieks, kurš katru dienu ceļo pa Dromas upes apkārtni. Viņš satiek savas dzīves īsto sievieti Filomenu, un no viņu savienības piedzimst Alise. Tad viņš metas trakā azartspēlē: savām rokām uzcelt viņai neticamu pili.

programme.title: Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā
programme.desc: "Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā" ir ieskats notikumos, kas veidoja vienu no pretrunīgākajiem un noslēpumainākajiem amerikāņu rakstniekiem – Dž. D. Selindžeru. Filmas darbība risinās 20. gadsimta vidū Ņujorkā, kad jaunais Selindžers meklē savu vietu dzīvē. Pārciestais frontē 2. Pasaules karā, mīlas dēka ar augstāko aprindu jaunkundzi Ūnu ONīlu un pirmie literārie centieni – šī pieredze ir pamatā viņa pasaulē, iespējams, slavenākajam literārajam meistardarbam "Uz kraujas rudzu laukā". Galvenās lomas atveido jaunais britu aktieris Nikolass Holts un sevi jau pierādījušais ASV kino meistars Kevins Speisijs.

programme.title: Vīriešu siržu valdzinātāja
programme.desc: Romantiska drāma, kas uzņemta politiski uzlādētajā 60. gadu pirmajā pusē. Kāda sieviete atgriezusies savās mājās dienvidos, un atklāj, ka viņas iespējas ir būtiski ierobežotas. Ar palīdzību no Kongresa viņai izdodas aizsākt vēsturisku normatīvo aktu pieņemšanu, kas palīdzēs turpmāk sievietēm iegūt tādas iespējas un aizsardzību, kāda līdz šim nav bijusi.

programme.title: Best Bite In Town
programme.desc: New Haven. Noah Cappe, Jet Tila and Tiffani Faison visit the top restaurants in New Haven, Connecticut. There, they sample burgers, hot honey pizza, hot chicken and empanadas.

programme.title: Best Bite In Town
programme.desc: Newport. Noah Cappe, Tiffani Faison and Shota Nakajima explore the food scene in Newport, Rhode Island. They taste everything from chowder and noodles to burgers and biscuits.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Two talented chefs go head-to-head for the chance to Beat Bobby Flay. To get to Bobby the chefs must first face off against each other, creating a spectacular dish with a secret ingredient of Bobbys choice. Judges Alex Guarnaschelli and Jeff Mauro know Bobbys strengths and his weaknesses. Their goal: Pick the chef who has the skills to take down Bobby Flay in his own arena. The winning chef gets to challenge Bobby with his or her surprise signature dish. If Bobby goes down, the winner can tell the world, "I beat Bobby Flay!"

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is putting together some delicious campfire favorites and reliving her childhood by camping out in her backyard. Her husband Nick is building the fire, and theyve invited some old camp buddies to join the fun. Dinner and dessert by the fire starts with Bonfire Eggs with Green Peppers and Cheese cooked right in the coals. Then they enjoy Bagel Dogs with Curry Ketchup, tangy Cherry Bug Juice and a flaky Smores Slab Pie for dessert.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Island Livin. Robert Irvine goes to Catalina Island for the new tourism season and celebrates the island getting back on its feet. Plus, he helps a restaurant open with a bang.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Two talented chefs go head-to-head for the chance to Beat Bobby Flay. To get to Bobby the chefs must first face off against each other, creating a spectacular dish with a secret ingredient of Bobbys choice. Judges Alex Guarnaschelli and Jeff Mauro know Bobbys strengths and his weaknesses. Their goal: Pick the chef who has the skills to take down Bobby Flay in his own arena. The winning chef gets to challenge Bobby with his or her surprise signature dish. If Bobby goes down, the winner can tell the world, "I beat Bobby Flay!"

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Island Livin. Robert Irvine goes to Catalina Island for the new tourism season and celebrates the island getting back on its feet. Plus, he helps a restaurant open with a bang.

programme.title: Guys Ultimate Game Night
programme.desc: Guy Fieri serves up an epic night in the Flavortown Lounge. Actors Alyssa Milano, Ben Feldman and Francia Raisa must create a pizza that looks like Guy!

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Goals
programme.desc: "Targets" is a documentary project about the incredible strength of the human spirit. These are sincere confessions of soldiers, medics, and civilians who went through the hell of war, captivity, and severe injuries. Stories about how not to break down when it seems that everything is lost, and how the state helps heroes find their way back to life.

programme.desc: "Mariupol. Reconstruction" is a film about the city that has been lost forever. Originally from Mariupol, the film director Svitlana Lischynska shares her reminiscences and tells a story of her relations with the city. Svitlana meets refugees who fled Mariupol in order to recall together what the city had been like before it was destroyed by Russian troops.

programme.title: Making History
programme.desc: This program presents an in in-depth exploration of the history of Ukraine, with an emphasis on its most recent past. programme.title: Aptiekārs Melhiors: Bendes meita
programme.desc: Viduslaiku trilleru trešajā filmā Melhiora sieva Keterlīna kļūst par liecinieci nežēlīgam uzbrukumam. Nezināma jaunekļa dzīvība tiek izglābta, taču cietušais, kurš zaudējis atmiņu, nezina, kas viņš ir un kā nonācis Tallinā. Uzbrukuma vietā atrastais gredzens aizved Melhioru pie Nakts brālības, bet dīvainā trupas izrāde Tirgus dienā rada vēl vairāk jautājumu. Baisas zīmes liecina, ka briesmas draud ne vien nezināmajam, kurš atgūstas no uzbrukuma, bet arī Melhioram un Keterlīnai, kuri viņu ārstē. Tajā pašā laikā pilsētā ierodas pāvesta sūtnis – nežēlīgs raganu mednieks.

programme.title: Abigeila
programme.desc: Ļaundaru grupa nolaupa ietekmīga noziedzīgās pasaules pārstāvja 12 gadus veco meitu baletdejotāju. Viņu mērķis ir paturēt meiteni ieslodzījumā uz vienu nakti, lai tiktu pie 50 miljonu dolāru lielas izpirkuma maksas. Taču mājā, kurā viņi ir apmetušies, notiek savādas lietas - cits pēc cita pazūd nolaupītāji, un ar pieaugošām šausmām viņi atklāj, ka ir ieslēgti kopā ar kādu, kas nav tipiska maza meitenīte.

programme.title: Adaptācija
programme.desc: Pazīstams dramaturgs Čārlijs Kaufmans (Nikolass Keidžs) saņem pasūtījumu uzrakstīt filmas scenāriju pēc grāmatas "Orhideju zaglis" motīviem. Tajā žurnāliste Sūzena Orleāna (Merila Strīpa) apraksta avantūristu Džonu Laroču, kas ir tiesāts par īpašu orhideju zādzību no rezervāta. Nespēdams izdomāt scenārijam adekvātu sižeta noslēgumu Čārlijs piekrīt dvīņubrāļa piedāvājumam izsekot žurnālisti. Izrādās, ka grāmatā aprakstītie notikumi ievērojami atšķiras no realitātes un ziedu zagšanai ir pavisam citi iemesli. Sūzena izrādās iesaistījusies avantūrista Laroča dzīvē vairāk nekā parasta vērotāja no malas.

programme.title: Alarum
programme.desc: Silvestrs Stallone – spiegu trillerī. Precēts spiegu pāris slēpjas no varas iestādēm, kas meklē pazudušu cieto disku.

programme.title: Krūdi
programme.desc: Aizvēsturiska piedzīvojumu komēdija par pasaules pirmo ģimeni, kura dodas unikālā ceļojumā, kad viņu dzimtā ala tiek iznīcināta. Ceļojot pa elpu aizraujošajām ainavām, Krūdi atklāj pasakainu, jaunu vietu, kur mīt vēl neredzētas būtnes. Viņu pasaules uztvere mainās uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Strāvas karš
programme.desc: Dramatisks sāncensības stāsts par elektrības atklāšanas laikmeta titāniem Tomasu Edisonu un Džordžu Vestinghausu, lai noskaidrotu, kura izgudrotā elektriskā sistēma būs noteicošā modernizētajā pasaulē.

programme.title: Pusotrs spiegs
programme.desc: Kelvins Džoiners (Kevins Hārts) skolas laikā bija populārais puisis. Divdesmit gadus vēlāk viņš ir veiksmīgs grāmatvedis, kuru pārsteidz ziņa no Boba Stouna. Izrādās, ka patiesībā viņš ir Robijs Vīrdikts (Dveins Džonsons) – apsmietais tīnis viņa skolā. Bobs ir trenējies divdesmit gadus un šobrīd ir izcils CIP aģents. Viņš algo Kelvinu, lai ar viņa grāmatvedības prasmju palīdzību izsekotu ierīci, kura ASV spiegošanas jomā var radīt jucekli. Dīvainais pāris sastopas ar pārspēku, taču viņiem sanāk arī daži varoņdarbi.

programme.title: Plāns B
programme.desc: Paraugskolniece ir spiesta palīdzēt savai dumpinieciskajai draudzenei sadabūt kontracepcijas tableti pēc ne visai veiksmīga pirmās nakts sakara. Viņas atrodas konservatīvā ASV vidienē, un viņām ir tikai 24 stundas.

programme.title: Grāmatu zagle
programme.desc: Filma "Grāmatu zagle", kuras pamatā ir pasaulē populārs romāns, ir stāsts par neparastu, enerģisku meiteni, kuru Otrā pasaules kara laikā Vācijā nosūta dzīvot audžuģimenē. Meiteni ieintriģē vienīgā grāmata, ko viņa paņēmusi līdzi, tāpēc viņa sāk kolekcionēt grāmatas. Ar savu jauno vecāku un zem kāpnēm mītošā slepenā viesa palīdzību meitene iemācās lasīt un izveido brīnumainu pasauli, kas iedvesmo viņus visus.

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Ir pagājuši pieci gadi, kopš Hiks un Nezobs veiksmīgi apvienoja pūķus un vikingus uz Berkas salas. Kamēr Astrīda, Snūģis un pārējie sacenšas pūķu sacīkstēs (kas ir salas iemītnieku mīļākais sporta veids), nešķiramie draugi iepazīst apkārtni, veidojot līdz šim neatklāto teritoriju karti un atklājot jaunas pasaules. Kārtējā piedzīvojuma laikā viņi atklāj slepenu ledus alu, kur mīt vairāki simti savvaļas pūķu un noslēpumainais Pūķu Jātnieks. Hiku un Nezobu ierauj kaujā par miera saglabāšanu pasaulē. Tagad viņiem jācīnās par to, kam viņi tic, un tikai kopīgiem spēkiem draugi spēs mainīt cilvēku un pūķu nākotni.

programme.title: Džūdija
programme.desc: Biogrāfiska drāma par izcilās ASV dziedātājas un aktrises Džūdijas Gārlendas dzīvi. Gārlenda 1968. gadā, gadu pirms savas nāves, devās uz Eiropu, lai koncertētu Londonā. Filmā attēloti pēdējie mēneši kinozvaigznes dzīvē, pirms viņa izdarīja pašnāvību.

programme.title: Marmelāde
programme.desc: Filma par kādu ieslodzīto, kurš ar savu veiklo kameras biedru dalās paša izdomātā krāšņā, romantiskā bankas aplaupīšanas stāstā un izbēg, apvienojoties ar savas dzīves mīlestību.

programme.title: Bostonas slepkava
programme.desc: 60. gados Bostonu pārbiedē virkne nežēlīgu slepkavību, kuru upuri ir sievietes. Spītējot tā laika uzskatam par sieviešu lomu sabiedrībā un viedokli, ka daiļā dzimuma pārstāvēm jāraksta par modi un izklaidi, nevis jāšķetina nopietni noziegumi, Loreta un viņas kolēģe Džīna Koula atklāj, ka Bostonā notikušās sieviešu nožņaugšanas ir savstarpēji saistītas un tās paveicis sērijveida slepkava. Loreta slepkavu nodēvē par "Bostonas žņaudzēju", četru rakstu sērijā atklājot satraucošas likumsakarības un iestāžu kļūdas, kas ļāva slepkavam nekontrolēti darboties.

programme.title: Tumšākā stunda
programme.desc: Kad Otrā pasaules kara laikā Ādolfa Hitlera varenā Vērmahta armija plosās Eiropā, Lielbritānijas premjerministrs Nevils Čemberleins ir spiests atkāpties no amata, savā vietā iesakot Vinstonu Čērčilu. Jau pašā premjera darbības sākumā Čērčilam jāizlemj, vai vest miera sarunas ar Vācijas diktatoru vai cīnīties ar šķietami neuzveicamo nacistu režīmu aci pret aci, lai ko tas arī prasītu. Neraugoties uz grūto un iespējami bīstamo lēmumu, Čērčilam nav citas izvēles, kā mirdzēt savas valsts tumšākajā stundā.

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: Džonam Makleinam diez ko neveicas. Viņa laulība pamazām izirst, viņš ir atstādināts no amata, un nu Hansa Grūbera (vācu terorists, kuru Džons nosvieda no jumta pirms pāris gadiem) brālis draud uzspridzināt kādu skolu, ja Makleins nepiekritīs skraidīt pa pilsētu, cenšoties atrisināt Grūbera bīstamos uzdevumus.

programme.title: Kaķu mīlis
programme.desc: Koledžas studente Margo piestrādā nelielā kinoteātrī, kur iepazīstas ar biežu tā apmeklētāju, par sevi vecāko Robertu. Pāri letei aizsāktais flirts pārtop nepārtrauktā čatošanā. Kad abi nonāk līdz randiņam, Margo atklāj, ka dzīvē satiktais Roberts itin nemaz neatbilst tam Robertam, ar kuru viņa flirtējusi īsziņās. Skarbs vēstījums par dzimumu dalījumu, ķepurošanos cauri modernās randiņošanas staignājam un to, kādas bīstamas īpašības mēs mēdzam piedēvēt cilvēkiem otrpus mūsu telefoniem.

programme.title: Dogmens
programme.desc: Kad uzticīgais policijas suns un viņa saimnieks dežūras laikā gūst ievainojumus, ārsti paveic dzīvību glābjošu operāciju, un no viņiem abiem top viens - atjautīgais Dogmens! Viņš dod svinīgo policista zvērestu aizsargāt un kalpot. Tikko Dogmens sāk pildīt policista uzdevumus un cenšas atstāt labu iespaidu uz priekšnieku, viņam tiek sarežģīts uzdevums - jāaptur superļaundara kaķa Pītija varenais plāns.

programme.title: Tauriņa stāsts
programme.desc: Tuvojoties ziemai, monarhu tauriņi migrē uz dienvidiem, lai pārziemotu siltumā. Taču Patrika spārni vēl nav gatavi tālajam ceļam, un viņš nevar lidot. Nedomādams padoties, Patriks kopā ar savu labāko draugu kāpuru Mārtiju paslēpjas pārtikas treilerī, kuru velk Dženifera. Tomēr arī viņai ir savas bažas par ceļojumu, jo - tauriņam neierasti - viņu māc bailes no augstuma. Visus trīs gaida daudz piedzīvojumu un sūri gūtu mācību, līdz mērķis būs sasniegts.

programme.title: Bēbis boss
programme.desc: Tims Templtons ir savu vecāku uzmanības centrā. Un tā tas ir līdz brīdim, kad viņš satiek savu jauno brālīti – jaundzimušo pieguļošā uzvalkā ar uzņēmēja iemaņām. Abi kašķējas kā jau visi brāļi, izmantojot gan pazemojošas izjokošanas, gan tuvcīņas. Tomēr viņi beidz savas domstarpības, kad bēbis boss atklāj savu ģeniālo plāno, kā iegūt atpakaļ uzmanību, kas veltīta viņu galvenajiem konkurentiem kucēniem. Abi savāc pilsētas mazo bērnu bandu un ar šīs dīvainās komandas palīdzību mēģina izjaukt gaidāmo pasākumu mājdzīvniekiem, lai atgūtu mazuļu likumīgo vietu mīlīguma hierarhijā.

programme.title: Kapteinis Zobenzobs un burvju briljants
programme.desc: Ļaunais princis Megans Hans no džungļiem un Karību jūras pirāts kapteinis Zobenzobs jau sen dzen maģiskā briljanta pēdas. Tas nav parasts dārgakmens. Pusnaktī tas spēj piepildīt viskvēlāko vēlēšanos, lai kāda tā būtu. Visi meklējumi "kaķim zem astes", taču tad, klejodams pa džungļiem, burvju dārgakmeni nejauši ierauga mazais Marks.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku brīvdienās dodoties uz Parīzi, Makkalisteru ģimene nejauši aizmirst mājās savu astoņgadīgo dēlu Kevinu. Tiesa, tas zēnam neliedz sarīkot pašam savas Ziemassvētku svinības. Beidzot viņu neviens vairs nekomandē, neierobežo un nepieskata! Viss būtu ideāli, ja vien rūdītie kramplauži Harijs un Mārvs nebūtu ieplānojuši apzagt visas tuvākās apkaimes mājas pašā svētku vakarā.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Iepriekšējos Ziemassvētkos, dodoties brīvdienās uz Franciju, Makkalisteri aizmirsa mājās savu jaunāko atvasi Kevinu. Šogad, dodoties uz Floridu, viņi dēlu pazaudē lidostā. Kamēr ģimene lido uz Maiami, Kevins ar tēva kredītkartēm kabatā ir ceļā uz Ņujorku. Lielajā pilsētā viņš atrod jaunus draugus, iekārtojas lepnākajā viesnīcā un sastop arī savus vecos paziņas – divus aprobežotos kramplaužus. Šoreiz abi ļaundari Ziemassvētku vakarā plāno apzagt lielāko rotaļlietu veikalu Ņujorkā. Turklāt viņi jau sen alkst atriebties Kevinam – zēnam, kura dēļ nonāca cietumā.

programme.title: Lemāna-66: Lielais izaicinājums
programme.desc: Filmas sižets balstīts patiesos notikumus un atgādina par autosporta vēstures spriedzes pilnām lapaspusēm. Notikumi risinās 60. gados, kad konstruktoru grupa, kuru vadīja Kerols Šelbijs, kopā ar britu sacīkšu braucēju Kenu Mailsu uzbūvēja vēl nebijušu "Ford" sporta automašīnu un meta izaicinājumu Lemānas 24 stundu sacīkšu favorītam "Ferrari".

programme.title: Ledus laikmets: Lielā sadursme
programme.desc: Skreta (Kriss Vedžs) nepārtrauktie pūliņi noglabāt savu zīli liek viņam izraisīt negadījumu virkni, kuru rezultātā asteroīdi sāk traukties uz Zemi. Haoss liek Manijam (Rejs Romano), Djego (Deniss Līrijs), Sidam (Džons Legvizamo) un viņu ģimenēm meklēt patvērumu. Piedzīvojumu meklētāja zebiekste Baks (Saimons Pegs) viņus brīdina, ka var sākties masveida izmiršana, kas liek draugiem meklēt jaunu mājvietu, pa ceļam satiekot citus dzīvniekus un apmeklējot eksotiskas vietas.

programme.title: Madagaskara
programme.desc: Kā lauvam, zebrai, žirafei, nīlzirgam, bariņam pingvīnu, lemuru un pērtiķu tikt cauri Eiropai, nepievēršot sev lieku uzmanību? Alekss, Mārtijs, Melmans, Glorija un viņu draugi pievienojas ceļojošajam cirkam, cerībā atkal nokļūt mājās, Ņujorkā. Melmens iemācīsies staigāt pa virvi, karalis Džūljens neglābjami iemīlēsies... Īsi sakot - viņu mājupceļš būs īsts cirks!

programme.title: Zaļknābis pie stūres
programme.desc: Viņš ir ļoti jauns un prot ļoti ātri un labi braukt, kad jātiek prom no nozieguma vietas. Tas ir neviens cits kā labākais auto vadītājs, saukts par Mazo. Kad Mazais satiek savu sapņu meiteni, viņš vēlas pamest noziedzīgo pasauli. Taču tas nav tik vienkārši, kā šķiet, kad Mazais tiek iesaistīts vēl vienā noziegumā, kas apdraud viņa dzīvi, mīlestību un brīvību.

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: Šajā spriedzes trillerī, kas pacēla latiņu žanra filmām, Brūss Viliss atveido Ņujorkas policistu Džonu Makleinu, kurš Losandželosā ir ieradies pavadīt brīvdienas ar savu sievu Holiju. Bet, kamēr Makleins gaida, līdz beigsies Holijas darba ballīte, ēkā iebrūk teroristi. Grupējuma vadonis Hanss Grūbers ar saviem padotajiem sagrābj ķīlniekus, bet Makleins tikmēr gatavojas pieteikt viena cilvēka karu, un uzvarēt tajā var tikai Makleins!

programme.title: Operācija "Black Bag"
programme.desc: Izlūkdienesta aģente Katrīna Vudhausa tiek turēta aizdomās par valsts nodevību. Viņas vīrs, leģendārais slepenais aģents Džordžs Vudhauss, saskaras ar nepiespējamu pārbaudījumu – būt uzticīgam savai laulībai vai valstij.

programme.title: Cūka
programme.desc: Robam (Nikolass Keidžs) ir īpašs talants – viņš ir izcils šefpavārs un reiz viņš priecēja savus turīgos klientus ar lieliskiem ēdieniem. Taču, kad nomira viņa sieva, Roba dzīve sabruka. Viņš beidza karjeru un pārcēlās uz nomaļu meža namiņu. Par Roba vienīgo kompanjonu nu kļuvusi trifeļu cūka, ar kuru kopā viņš pelna iztiku, – līdz pēkšņi viņa četrkājainā draudzene tiek nozagta. Lai viņu atgūtu, Robs ir gatavs doties kaut līdz pasaules malai.

programme.title: Ekstrēmais sports: FIS PK. Veysonnaz (SUI) Ski Cross
Futbols: Ligue 1. Marseille - Lens
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Paris - Real Madrid
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Cīņu sports: One Championship. ONE Fight Night
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a mixed martial arts (MMA) organization that showcases world-class fighters from across the globe. With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Atletico Madrid - Mallorca
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Basketbols: ACB league. Unicaja - Murcia

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Barcelona - Real Oviedo
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

Basketbols: Eirolīga. Fenerbahce - Baskonia
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Bundesliga. St.Pauli - RB Leipzig
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A pediatric doctor is ready to escape the sprawl of Los Angeles and find the perfect beach home on Amelia Island, Florida. An East Coast native who moved west for medical school, she wants to be closer to her family.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: North Carolina natives want to move from Phoenix back east to Topsail Island, NC. Their desert city is just too big, too busy and, most importantly, too far from the beach, so theyre looking for an oceanfront dream home.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.desc: Dave and Jenny travel to Italy to take on their biggest project yet, helping friends whove poured their life savings into a Tuscan farmhouse rental.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous: Italiano
programme.desc: Its been two months since they last checked in and as new challenges unfold, Dave and Jenny worry the villa will not be ready for a July deadline.

programme.title: Renovation Impossible
programme.desc: Contractor Russell Holmes helps clients get their stalled renos back on track using ingenious compromises and dollar-stretching solutions.

programme.title: Vacation House for Free
programme.desc: Matt Blashaw realizes couples wishes to own a vacation home mortgage free. The secret? He helps them shop for and renovate a "diamond in the rough" home in their dream location to command top dollar as a vacation rental. The end result? The couple rents out the renovated home for maximum income part of the year, covering all their annual expenses. For the rest of the year they live in a Vacation House for Free!

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. After visiting nearby comparables, the sisters make the necessary, impactful renovations that convert these unlovable houses into diamonds in the rough.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Design Down Under
programme.desc: Husband and wife design build team, Richie Morris and Georgia Ezra, create one-of-a-kind, modern designs and bespoke spaces for their clients in Melbourne, Australia while juggling their thriving businesses and family of four.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: The Renovator
programme.desc: Marcus Lemonis helps a father and his daughter with a home thats stuck in time after the loss of his wife. Marcus looks to free up space for new family memories.

programme.title: Sin City Rehab
programme.desc: Alison makes a deal on the hacienda and gets her first Vegas flip, but she needs the property to sell for $2 million or shell lose her profit share.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Famous jailbreaks are the stuff of legend as their true stories are often untold. Now, with dramatic recreations, dynamic storytelling and cutting-edge visual effects, escapes from prisons like Alcatraz will come to life in graphic detail in the new nonfiction series "Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman." Hosted by Academy Award® winner Morgan Freeman, each episode will unearth every step of an inmates meticulous plan, the escape route and the intense manhunt that immediately followed.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Pablo Escobar, the notorious narco-trafficker who single-handedly supplied most of Americas cocaine in the 1980s, had billions of dollars in cash...and hid stacks of it all over the country. Who killed Pablo Escobar? And where did all his money go?

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum journey to St. Paul, Minnesota, where they unearth an impressive trilobite fossil collection. Then, Rick grows a heart for a first edition "Tin Woodman of Oz" book, and Chum offers his two cents on an ancient coin collection.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Back in Las Vegas, the guys are ready to hit the jackpot. With the home field advantage, Chum beams at a lightbulb trick from Vegas own Mr. Electric, while Rick kneels on a stool from Queen Elizabeth IIs coronation.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Imagine freefalling 30,000 feet without a parachute, or being buried alive and living to tell the tale or, what about, getting trapped in a room inside a sunken ship on the ocean floor for three days. These are improbable, yet true-life tales.

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Famous jailbreaks are the stuff of legend as their true stories are often untold. Now, with dramatic recreations, dynamic storytelling and cutting-edge visual effects, escapes from prisons like Alcatraz will come to life in graphic detail in the new nonfiction series "Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman." programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Pablo Escobar, the notorious narco-trafficker who single-handedly supplied most of Americas cocaine in the 1980s, had billions of dollars in cash...and hid stacks of it all over the country. Who killed Pablo Escobar? And where did all his money go?

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: There are men in America who must still make their living off the land; hunting and trapping to provide for their families. They are MOUNTAIN MEN. Their very survival is predicated on utilizing ancient skills perfected over hundreds of years. This series features a variety of men from Appalachia to the Rocky Mountains to Alaska and follows them as they race against winter to obtain the sustenance and money needed to make it through the coldest months of the year. Eustace Conway lives deep in the mountains of North Carolina on the "Turtle Bay Reserve." He moved here two decades ago in search of a more "truthful" existence. In the years since, hes built a home, and survived by hunting, fishing and raising animals. Tom Orr lives with his wife on the Yaak River in Montana. He is 100 miles from the nearest town, a place he hasnt ventured to in 10 years. John is a trapper by trade and to prepare for winter, he must earn enough money to obtain the supplies he needs. Marty Meierotto, his wife Dominique and their daughter Noah live in the small Alaskan town of Two Rivers. Every month, Marty pilots his bi-plane, traveling into the bush in search of the wolverine and lynx pelts he needs to make a living. While hes on the Black River, he must hunt moose and caribou to survive in the wilderness. Together, they represent Americas true MOUNTAIN MEN.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: In this episode, Corey, Chum, and Rick are back in Vegas and unpacking all the treasures they found on the road and revealing some never-before-seen items. From belt buckles in Texas, to sleek yachts in Seattle, and 18th century pistols.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: As the Pawn Stars traveled around America, Rick, Corey, and Chum have taken a bite out of all this country has to offer. Now that theyre back in Vegas, Rick takes the guys on a culinary trip down memory lane.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Follow award-winning actor Laurence Fishburne as he guides you through a number of mysteries that confused humanity for years, attempting to investigate what really happened, while looking at some new clues and leads. This documentary programme will try to answer some interesting and enduring questions, such as what was the true reason the Titanic sank, what happened to D.B. Cooper, did John Wilkes Booth fake his death, and many more.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island

Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: In this episode, Corey, Chum, and Rick are back in Vegas and unpacking all the treasures they found on the road and revealing some never-before-seen items. From belt buckles in Texas, to sleek yachts in Seattle, and 18th century pistols.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: As the Pawn Stars traveled around America, Rick, Corey, and Chum have taken a bite out of all this country has to offer. Now that theyre back in Vegas, Rick takes the guys on a culinary trip down memory lane.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Countdown To Apocalypse
programme.desc: Native American tribe the Hopi have been making prophecies for centuries. They believe that our actions have caused the planet to become out of balance, and will trigger a cataclysmic purification that few will survive.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Stonemasons Jim and Bill Vieira are on a quest to investigate an incredible theory: that the myths and legends weve all been told about giants are actually rooted in fact. Jim has researched over 1,000 accounts of skeletons seven feet tall or over unearthed across America in the 19th and 20th centuries. SEARCH FOR THE LOST GIANTS will follow the Vieira brothers on their quest to find evidence of these missing bones, which seem to have slipped through the hands of history. Theyll dig for secret chambers, explore underground tunnels and dive into the deepest museum storage vaults–all to find that one bone, that one hair, that single strand of giant DNA that will answer the question: did giants walk the Earth?

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In Colorados Rocky Mountains, a terrifying creature hunts elk and frightens residents. Centuries-old stories describe encounters with a screaming beast. MonsterQuest investigates, searching for evidence of the legendary Snowbeast on Pikes Peak.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Sharks have terrified people for centuries and deep within the forbidding waters of Mexicos Baja Peninsula may lurk a mammoth sixty foot monster. Could it be a new giant species or some living relic, hidden in the sea?

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Tlingit folklore describes a creature thats half-otter, half-man, and steals the souls of its victims. Could a shapeshifting otter-man, or Kushtaka, be disguising itself to target humans as prey? Our team investigate whether this creature is a myth.

programme.title: Rome: Rise and Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: A thirteen hour series which focuses on the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars with Rome which ultimately led to the decline and fall of the Roman Empire. This series is centered on the campaigns and battles with the barbarian tribes and extensive examinations of the reigns of little known Roman emperors and generals. The significance and structures of key barbarian tribes and the roles their leaders played are explored in detail. Territorial changes to the Roman Empire caused by unrelenting wars, plagues, mass starvations and power struggles are presented in chronological historical context with extensive re-enactments. This series examines how the continuous wars with the barbarians and depletion of resources became a core cause of the Roman Empires decline and eventual collapse.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: In River Hunters, Rick Edwards and river-searching expert Beau Ouimette visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain: covering iconic events and battles including Roman Briton, the Wars of the Roses, the Reformation and the English Civil War. Their searches of these unexplored rivers and waterways unearth treasures from the past which reveal how our various ancestors used to live. As the artefacts surface from under layers of silt and rocks, the duo will meet with local archaeologists and historians to unearth the stories and people behind the finds. Spanning each rivers layered past, the new series will offer a fresh perspective and even redefine our history as we know it. Using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, Beau and Rick perform the first underwater archeological digs in some of the most exciting and iconic historical sites in Britain, often in dangerous and fast-flowing water.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Stonemasons Jim and Bill Vieira are on a quest to investigate an incredible theory: that the myths and legends weve all been told about giants are actually rooted in fact. Jim has researched over 1,000 accounts of skeletons seven feet tall or over unearthed across America in the 19th and 20th centuries. SEARCH FOR THE LOST GIANTS will follow the Vieira brothers on their quest to find evidence of these missing bones, which seem to have slipped through the hands of history. Theyll dig for secret chambers, explore underground tunnels and dive into the deepest museum storage vaults–all to find that one bone, that one hair, that single strand of giant DNA that will answer the question: did giants walk the Earth?

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In Colorados Rocky Mountains, a terrifying creature hunts elk and frightens residents. Centuries-old stories describe encounters with a screaming beast. MonsterQuest investigates, searching for evidence of the legendary Snowbeast on Pikes Peak.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Sharks have terrified people for centuries and deep within the forbidding waters of Mexicos Baja Peninsula may lurk a mammoth sixty foot monster. Could it be a new giant species or some living relic, hidden in the sea?

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Tlingit folklore describes a creature thats half-otter, half-man, and steals the souls of its victims. Could a shapeshifting otter-man, or Kushtaka, be disguising itself to target humans as prey? Our team investigate whether this creature is a myth.

programme.title: Rome: Rise and Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: A thirteen hour series which focuses on the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars with Rome which ultimately led to the decline and fall of the Roman Empire. This series is centered on the campaigns and battles with the barbarian tribes and extensive examinations of the reigns of little known Roman emperors and generals. The significance and structures of key barbarian tribes and the roles their leaders played are explored in detail. Territorial changes to the Roman Empire caused by unrelenting wars, plagues, mass starvations and power struggles are presented in chronological historical context with extensive re-enactments. This series examines how the continuous wars with the barbarians and depletion of resources became a core cause of the Roman Empires decline and eventual collapse.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: In River Hunters, Rick Edwards and river-searching expert Beau Ouimette visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain: covering iconic events and battles including Roman Briton, the Wars of the Roses, the Reformation and the English Civil War. Their searches of these unexplored rivers and waterways unearth treasures from the past which reveal how our various ancestors used to live. As the artefacts surface from under layers of silt and rocks, the duo will meet with local archaeologists and historians to unearth the stories and people behind the finds. Spanning each rivers layered past, the new series will offer a fresh perspective and even redefine our history as we know it. Using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, Beau and Rick perform the first underwater archeological digs in some of the most exciting and iconic historical sites in Britain, often in dangerous and fast-flowing water.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Across North America there is something strange and frightening circling overhead. Witnesses tell of human-like creatures that float or hover in the skies and often descend to attack. Legends and folklore tell of strange flying creatures.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Reality series following the adventures of Egyptologist Dr Zahi Hawass and his team as they search for the secrets of ancient Egypt. Travelling across this fascinating country, Dr Zahi Hawass and his crew embark on a historical and archaeological expedition – and try to preserve important artefacts.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 is smart, fun countdown that details how ancient technology worked, how surprisingly advanced it was, and how it was kind of awesome. Location shooting, CGI, and graphics are pulled from past History series Ancient Impossible and Ancient Discoveries, and lists are organized by themes. The stories are augmented by new entries fueled by the History archive. Episodes include updated "Top Ten" graphics and new interviews that provide "wow" facts and explain why something made the list. The lists will have organizing principles so it doesnt seem arbitrary. Episodes could include the following: Top 10 Secrets of Egypt, Top 10 Ancient Vikings, Top 10 Greek Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Weapons, Top 10 Ancient Monuments, Top 10 Ancient Ships, Top 10 Torture Devices, Top 10 Roman Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Swords, and Top 10 Ancient Sieges.

programme.title: Pirate Treasure of the Knights Templar
programme.desc: Barry and Scott learn the meaning behind one of the symbols on the prized metal ingot they believe once belonged to Captain Kidd, leading them one step closer to a Templar-Pirate connection - and finding lost treasure.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: Investigation Discovery and People magazine partner to re-examine some of the most high profile crime cases in recent history. The one-hour series brings viewers tales of betrayal, buried secrets and unsung heroes, ripped from the pages of one of the nations top weekly magazines. These stories transcended news and became part of pop culture, revealing shocking twists, new evidence, and unexpected resolutions. Interlaced within every episode are exclusive interviews with Peoples journalists, archival footage, re-creations, and firsthand accounts by those closest to the investigations.

programme.title: Evil Stepmothers
programme.desc: True crime series. When parents separate or divorce it is always tough for the children. So when a father finds a new partner and welcomes her to the family, how can you be sure if she is as amiable as first appearances suggest? These harrowing real stories, along with re-enactments, reveal how step-mothers can change from friendly parental figures, to abusive and even murderous family members. Featuring tales from across the United States, these brutal and vicious women make Cinerallas stepmother look like a saint, and truly support the old saying: you cant judge a book by its cover.

programme.title: Evil Twins
programme.desc: In this true-crime documentary series we reveal heinous acts committed by evil twins. A well-studied, natural phenomenon, many people believe twins have a unique bond that is unexplainable by science. These intriguing siblings share a womb, identical DNA and, in many cases, similar personalities. We explore the chilling crimes these maniacal twins have committed, occasionally against each other. Each episode focusses on a different crime and tries to understand the motive behind the madness. Murder cases, thefts, city-running gangsters; we explore copious different cases that have involved twin siblings.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: The Killer Speaks
programme.desc: During the day Lorenzo Gilyard is a well-liked professional. At night hes a monster, preying on the women who work the streets.

programme.title: Evil Talks: Chilling Confessions
programme.desc: A true crime series that takes a unique view at an often overlooked part of criminal investigations - the confession. Covering crimes from home invasions to murder, this show examines all aspects of crime and highlights the skillful tactics used by law enforcement interrogation experts. Splicing dramatic simulations with actual police footage, each epsiode focuses on a different case and we are exposed to the often chilling verbatim accounts of the perpetrators as they are interviewed by the investigating officers. One such case involves two apparent strangers who are found dead in two separate states but who display the same MO. The detectives, from different jurisdictions, have to uncover the link between the two men, why they were killed and who the murderer is.

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: True crime series exploring the unexpected disappearances of people in the USA and the difficulty the police have with solving the mysteries. After members of the community vanish without a trace, law enforcement officials are tasked with tracking them down before they become a victim. These detectives, along with determined loved ones, spend years agonizing over minute details that could help them understand what led to the disappearance of seemingly untroubled people. With some cases taking decades to solve, Gone looks at the impact this has on friends and family members seeking closure.

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
programme.desc: This team of detectives are determined to detain the dangerous killers that they are faced with. What may initially seem like the "perfect murder" requires a great depth of investigation and dedication, but eventually the detectives crack them open and reveal the truth. The key to their success is their great level of persistence, and imaginative investigative skills. programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?
programme.desc: A true-crime documentary series examining murders of women and the two aspects of each case; the detectives pursuing the killer and the family struggling to come to terms with their loss. With dramatised reconstructions to portray the events as they happened, each episode focusses on a different, chilling murder, listening to both the professional and personal side of a murder investigation. Whilst detectives scour crime scenes for evidence and clues to identify a victim, a family is waiting in vain for the impending announcement, aware of who the victim could very well be. A unique murder documentary series that offers a reminder of the delicate and poignant side to each investigation.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: Things are not always as they seem in Investigation Discoverys Betrayed, which revisits heart-pounding cases of deception that ended in murder at the hands of a trusted family member, co-worker, lover, or friend. Told through the lens of the fictionalized, first-person perspectives of the victims, Betrayed treats the viewer like the only confidant they have left. As investigators, family, and friends peel back the layers and facts of each case, the otherworldly narrator already knows where the breadcrumb trail ends. They guide viewers through the various relationships that comprise their life, raising suspicions about who will commit the ultimate betrayal and bring about their doom.

programme.desc: Lindy Gligorijevic was known as The Killer Closer for her formidable work in the LAPDs Foothill Homicide Unit during the 1990s. programme.title: Музыкальная интуиция
programme.desc: Уникальное шоу, в котором 10 незнакомцев делают вид, что умеют петь, хотя на самом деле это утверждение правдиво лишь наполовину. Двум звёздным командам из комиков и музыкантов предстоит провести расследование, чтобы отличить певцов от лжецов и выиграть главный приз, который затем отправится в благотворительные фонды.

programme.title: Пентагон
programme.desc: Визит приглашенного съемочной группой адвоката-общественника заканчивается полным фиаско: жители "Пентагона" явно не намерены бороться за свои права. Случайно встреченный в кафе пьяный пожарный выносит тете Наташе и ее соседкам жестокий приговор: "Это дом для тех, кто не смог реализовать себя". С этим трудно поспорить, но кто в этом виноват: сами люди или власть, бросившая их наедине со своими бедами и вспоминающая о их существовании, только когда требуется свежее пушечное мясо?

programme.title: Ловушка
programme.desc: Главе самого мощного городского мафиозного клана удалось прекратить криминальные войны. Казалось бы, он наконец-то может уйти на покой, передав дела своим молодым и дерзким помощникам. Но те слишком рьяно берутся за дело: быстро удваивают доходы, но своими жесткими методами вызывают волну всеобщего недовольства. Мечта крестного отца о тихой жизни никак не осуществится - ему постоянно приходится вмешиваться, чтобы сохранить мир. Однако о мире приходится забыть, когда после 12-ти лет тюрьмы в город возвращается крупный криминальный авторитет, готовый любой ценой вернуть утраченные позиции.

programme.title: Утро
programme.desc: Утренняя новостная программа Настоящего времени.

programme.title: Ждём в гости
programme.desc: Проект Ирины Хангошвили о культуре, истории и традициях различных стран мира. Ведущий - Зураб Двали - путешествует и приглашает зрителей пройтись вместе с ним по красивым местам, увидеть достопримечательности, полюбоваться природой и познакомиться с интересными людьми. Всюду гостеприимные хозяева говорят нашим телезрителям: "Ждем в гости!" Зрители сначала узнают интересные исторические факты о самых известных или забытых регионах различных стран, и затем останавливаются на кулинарных традициях - готовят несколько блюд с гостями программы.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. Основная изюминка сериала – остроумный характер комедии, где на первый план выходят семейные отношения: с любящей, но часто критичной женой, Деброй, детьми, а также с навязчивыми родителями и завистливым братом, которые живут через дорогу. Сериал идеально подойдёт для тех, кто хочет смотреть лёгкие и забавные истории о семейной жизни. Серию за серией, комедийные ситуации создают атмосферу доброты и юмора.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
